sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SARACA, in botany; a genus of the hexandria order, belonging to the diadelphia claſs of plants — There is no calyx: the corolla is funnel-ſhaped and quadriſid; the filaments are on each ſide the throat of the corolla; the legumen is pedicellated.
